It's just that Lord Rance has also"},{"lineNumber":38430,"originalJapaneseLine":"　フェリスさんをいじめなくなったんだなー、って」","translatedEnglishLine":"stopped bullying Felis-san, I thought.\""},{"lineNumber":38431,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":38432,"originalJapaneseLine":"　………………あーーーーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\".........Ahhhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":38433,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あいつには命令できたんじゃないか馬鹿たれ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I could have given orders to that idiot!\""},{"lineNumber":38434,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひんっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek!?\""},{"lineNumber":38435,"originalJapaneseLine":"「消える前に言わんか、まったく」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why didn't you say that before disappearing, for heaven’s sake.\""},{"lineNumber":38436,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひどいです、ランス様ぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's terrible, Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":38437,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっそ、つい流してしまった……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn it, I just let it slip...\""},{"lineNumber":38438,"originalJapaneseLine":"　呼び戻すか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Should I call him back...?\""},{"lineNumber":38439,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん。ホルス達が戻ってきたな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm. Horus and the others have returned."},{"lineNumber":38440,"originalJapaneseLine":"　報告も来たぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"The report has come too.\""},{"lineNumber":38441,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがとうございます。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you very much."},{"lineNumber":38442,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ではそれを元に進める……で、いいですか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Shall we proceed based on that...? Is that okay?"},{"lineNumber":38443,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスさん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance...?\""},{"lineNumber":38444,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーもう、勝手にしろ！　俺は寝る！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, whatever, do as you please! I'm going to sleep!\""},{"lineNumber":38445,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふああぁぁ……ん、これで、七日目か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fwaaah... hmm, so this is the seventh day...\""},{"lineNumber":38446,"originalJapaneseLine":"翌日の朝。","translatedEnglishLine":"The next morning."},{"lineNumber":38447,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は今日の朝日も、海の上で迎えていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others greeted the morning sun on the sea once again."},{"lineNumber":38448,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そろそろ着きそうか？　ここからだと見えんが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are we about to arrive? I can't see it from here, though...\""},{"lineNumber":38449,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふむ、んむ……ぐしぐし","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, hmm... *sniffle sniffle*"},{"lineNumber":38450,"originalJapaneseLine":"ブラシで歯を磨きながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"While brushing his teeth,"},{"lineNumber":38451,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは呑気に大陸の方を見た。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance casually looked towards the continent."},{"lineNumber":38452,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう、ですね、ランス兄様。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right, Rance-nii-sama."},{"lineNumber":38453,"originalJapaneseLine":"　早く着くといいですが…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"I hope we arrive soon...\""},{"lineNumber":38454,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、香ちゃん、寝不足か？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, Ka-chan, are you sleep-deprived?"},{"lineNumber":38455,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いかんぞ、しっかり寝なきゃ身体に悪い。","translatedEnglishLine":"That's no good, you need to sleep well or it'll be bad for your body."},{"lineNumber":38456,"originalJapaneseLine":"　……がらがら、ぺっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"... *gargle gargle* *spit*\""},{"lineNumber":38457,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……はい、そうなんですけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... yes, that's true, but..."},{"lineNumber":38458,"originalJapaneseLine":"　足場が急になくなってしまうかと思うと、","translatedEnglishLine":"When I think the ground might suddenly disappear beneath me,"},{"lineNumber":38459,"originalJapaneseLine":"　つい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I just...\""},{"lineNumber":38460,"originalJapaneseLine":"「香ちゃんもおっかないか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ka-chan, you're scared too, huh."},{"lineNumber":38461,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぐふふ、なら今夜は添い寝してやろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe, in that case, I'll sleep next to you tonight.\""},{"lineNumber":38462,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……や、えと、そうではなく……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... no, um, that's not it...!"},{"lineNumber":38463,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いえその、怖いは怖いんですけれど……","translatedEnglishLine":"I mean, I am scared, but..."},{"lineNumber":38464,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まずどうするべきか、対策ばかり考えてしまって」","translatedEnglishLine":"First, I keep thinking only about what we should do and the countermeasures.\""},{"lineNumber":38465,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よしよし、それでは一緒に考えようではないか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, alright, then let's think together."},{"lineNumber":38466,"originalJapaneseLine":"　夜の打ち合わせだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"We'll have a strategy meeting tonight.\""},{"lineNumber":38467,"originalJapaneseLine":"「も、もう……絶対別の事考えてます……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-already... you're definitely thinking about something else...\""},{"lineNumber":38468,"originalJapaneseLine":"　兄様のえっち」","translatedEnglishLine":"You pervy brother.\""},{"lineNumber":38469,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様！　お城からの連絡が来てます。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance! A message has arrived from the castle."},{"lineNumber":38470,"originalJapaneseLine":"　出られますか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Can you answer?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 神に不埒な事を企てないように」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Make sure not to plan anything disrespectful against the gods."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じろっと目つきをきつくしてから、
ウィリスは姿を消した。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, no. It's just that Lord Rance has also

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスさんをいじめなくなったんだなー、って」
あいつには命令できたんじゃないか馬鹿たれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I could have given orders to that idiot!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「消える前に言わんか、まったく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why didn't you say that before disappearing, for heaven’s sake."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっそ、つい流してしまった……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn it, I just let it slip..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん。ホルス達が戻ってきたな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm. Horus and the others have returned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ではそれを元に進める……で、いいですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we proceed based on that...? Is that okay?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーもう、勝手にしろ！　俺は寝る！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, whatever, do as you please! I'm going to sleep!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふああぁぁ……ん、これで、七日目か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fwaaah... hmm, so this is the seventh day..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は今日の朝日も、海の上で迎えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others greeted the morning sun on the sea once again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そろそろ着きそうか？　ここからだと見えんが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are we about to arrive? I can't see it from here, though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブラシで歯を磨きながら、
ランスは呑気に大陸の方を見た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance casually looked towards the continent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早く着くといいですが…………」
いかんぞ、しっかり寝なきゃ身体に悪い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's no good, you need to sleep well or it'll be bad for your body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足場が急になくなってしまうかと思うと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I think the ground might suddenly disappear beneath me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐふふ、なら今夜は添い寝してやろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, in that case, I'll sleep next to you tonight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえその、怖いは怖いんですけれど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I mean, I am scared, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まずどうするべきか、対策ばかり考えてしまって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First, I keep thinking only about what we should do and the countermeasures."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よしよし、それでは一緒に考えようではないか。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll have a strategy meeting tonight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「も、もう……絶対別の事考えてます……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A-already... you're definitely thinking about something else..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様！　お城からの連絡が来てます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance! A message has arrived from the castle.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
